text: Porin is a grand opera by Vatroslav Lisinski. The Croatian text was by Dimitrija Demeter. It was Lisinski's second opera, the second for Croatia. It was composed during 1848-51 but not performed until 2 October 1897, when it was staged in Zagreb. ==Sources== * Lisinski, Vatroslav by Lovro Županović, in 'The New Grove Dictionary of Opera', ed.
